Regression package

Regression modules

Lasso module

class autoop.core.ml.model.regression.lasso.Lasso(alpha=1.0)[source]

Bases: Model

Lasso regression model for regression tasks using scikit-learn

fit(X, Y)[source]

Fits the lasso model to the provided values :param X : Numpy array of data :param Y : Numpy array of the target values corresponding to each observation

Return type:

None

predict(X)[source]

Takes the observations and calculates predictions using the parameters :param X : Numpy array of data :return : Numpy array of predicted target values correspond to the input observations

Return type:

ndarray

Multi_linear_regression module

class autoop.core.ml.model.regression.multi_linear_regression.MultipleLinearRegression[source]

Bases: Model

Multiple linear regression model for regression tasks using scikit-learn

fit(x, y)[source]

Fits the multiple linear regession model to the provided values :param x : Numpy array of data minus the variable to predict :param y : Numpy array of the variable to predict

Return type:

None

predict(x)[source]

Takes the observations and calculates predictions using the parameters :param x : Numpy array of the other variables :return : Numpy array of the predicted values

Return type:

ndarray

Ridge module

class autoop.core.ml.model.regression.ridge.RidgeModel(alpha=1.0)[source]

Bases: Model

Ridge regression model using scikit-learn for regression tasks

fit(X, y)[source]

Fits the ridge model to the provided values :param x : Numpy array of data minus the variable to predict :param y : Numpy array of the variable to predict

Return type:

None

predict(X)[source]

Takes the observations and calculates predictions using the parameters :param x : Numpy array of the other variables :return : Numpy array of the predicted values

Return type:

ndarray

Module contents

This module contains various machine learning models. It includes functionality for defining, training, and evaluating models for regression.
